section.name: AccessPlatform : What's New in 4.2
section.p: DataNucleus AccessPlatform version 4.2 extends the 4.1 capabilities supporting JDO 3.2. Below are some of the new features you can find in DataNucleus AccessPlatform 4.2.

ul.li: JDO : Support for JDO 3.2 JDOQLTypedQuery replacing DataNucleus JDO Typesafe Query
